brief_summary.textblock:
This is a single-center, multiple-dose, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy,
      placebo-controlled, active-comparator, parallel study in healthy volunteers.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple-Dose Study of Effect of Bardoxolone Methyl on QT/QTC Interval Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Blinded Randomized Parallel Trial to Define the ECG Effects of Bardoxolone Methyl Using a Clinical and a Supratherapeutic Dose Compared to Placebo and Moxifloxacin (a Positive Control) in Healthy Men and Women: A Thorough ECG Trial.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
